name: underspin
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the movement of a ball turning round very quickly in the air or on a surface so that the ball slows down or moves backwards after landing or hitting something: She puts underspin on the ball all the time. He hit his forehands with underspin, then overspin. Synonym
backspin
More examplesFewer examplesBrush the back of the ball downward for underspin.A stroke with underspin is the most dangerous passing shot, since the underspin causes the ball to rise.She throws in the front-of-the-hand balls, with underspin or overspin.
